proposal: Ever had that "YOU WON" moment turn into a hilarious bug? 😄 $UWON did, and now it's not just a meme-coin but a testament to victory, even in unexpected ways. With 44 holders on the ETH network, why not take it further? Imagine integrating a DEX or a community-driven lottery to really send $UWON to the moon. Let's prove winning comes in many forms.
